reviewText:
It was one of my first contacts with the mystery, and have followed the continuous research subsequent of this well documented report. I bought it in Beta Pal format about 30 years ago, and now, unable to play it back, was glad to find it in DVD.

This is the starting point I recommend to believers and those who aren't. It contains all the answers, and opens avenues of thought about the miracle or the science humankind has not yet achieved.
